title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 42.3 - Agreements for multiple facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 42.3 - Agreements for multiple facilities

State Regulations

When, in the judgement of the commissioner, it shall be in
the best interest of the public, the department may enter into agreements, contracts or leases for the development, operation and/or maintenance of
multiple facilities for the service and convenience of the public as one or
more units. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
42.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
